subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: J. T. Brown and Anton Stralman scored 15 seconds apart for the Lightning, and host Tampa Bay stopped a 10-game losing streak against the Boston Bruins with a 5-3 victory.
snippet: J. T. Brown and Anton Stralman scored 15 seconds apart for the Lightning, and host Tampa Bay stopped a 10-game losing streak against the Boston Bruins with a 5-3 victory.
